document.full_text: the united states olympic committee promised on tuesday to have a security plan in place before sending athletes to the pan american games this year in guadalajara, which is engulfed in a deepening drug war.
document.title: usoc concerned about drug war ahead of pan am games
lines_and_colors: the united states olympic committee promised on tuesday to have a security plan in place before sending athletes to the pan american games this year in guadalajara, which is engulfed in a deepening drug war.
